其の筈: (そのはず) - only natural; no wonder; as expected; of course; as it should be
其の筋: (そのすじ) - that field; the authorities (esp. the police)
其の節: (そのせつ) - at that time; that time
其の罪を憎んで其の人を憎まず: (そのつみをにくんでそのひとをにくまず) - (proverb)  condemn the offense, but not the offender; detest the sin, but weep for the sinner
其の許: (そのもと) - you (used toward one's equals or inferiors)
其の足で: (そのあしで) - straight (from one place to another); going right onto; on the way; simultaneously; incidentally; directly; at once
其の辺: (そのへん) - around there/near there; or thereabouts/or so; such a matter/such a thing
其の間: (そのかん) - in the meanwhile; during the time
其の際: (そのさい) - in so doing; when you do so; in this regard; on this occasion; some time during that period
其れ: (それ) - that (indicating an item or person near the listener, the action of the listener, or something on their mind)/it; that time/then; there (indicating a place near the listener); you
其れから: (それから) - and then; after that
其れしき: (それしき) - trivial; insignificant; meager; meagre; that little amount; such a small extent
其れじゃ: (それじゃ) - well then ...; in that situation/in which case
其れだけ: (それだけ) - that much; as much; to that extent; only that; that alone; no more than that; that is all (when finished speaking)
其れっ切り: (それっきり) - (stronger version of それきり)  no more than that/with that/on that note/altogether; since then/ending there
其れで: (それで) - and; thereupon; because of that
其れでこそ: (それでこそ) - quintessential point; what one expects; Attaboy!
其れでは: (それでは) - well then ...; in that situation/in which case
其れでも: (それでも) - but (still); and yet; nevertheless; even so; notwithstanding
其れと: (それと) - and then; even so; and
其れどころか: (それどころか) - on the contrary
其れなら: (それなら) - If that's the case ...; If so ...; That being the case ...
其れなり: (それなり) - in itself/as it is/in its own way/as suits the occasion; within its capacity/within limitations
其れなればこそ: (それなればこそ) - for that very reason
其れに: (それに) - besides; in addition; also; moreover
其れにもかかわらず: (それにもかかわらず) - nonetheless; nevertheless
其れにも拘わらず: (それにもかかわらず) - nonetheless; nevertheless
其れに引き替えて: (それにひきかえて) - in contrast; on the contrary; on the other hand
其れはそうと: (それはそうと) - by the way; incidentally
其れはそうとして: (それはそうとして) - be that as it may
其れまで: (それまで) - until then/till then/up to that time; to that extent; the end of it/all there is to it
其れも其のはず: (それもそのはず) - no wonder; little wonder; after all; as expected; which isn't surprising
其れ丈: (それだけ) - that much; as much; to that extent; only that; that alone; no more than that; that is all (when finished speaking)
其れ処: (それどころ) - (usu. before a verb in negative form) (not) so much; (not) that much
其れ処か: (それどころか) - on the contrary
其れ切り: (それぎり) - with that; on that note; altogether; ending at that point; cut off there
其れ式: (それしき) - trivial; insignificant; meager; meagre; that little amount; such a small extent
其れ形: (それなり) - in itself/as it is/in its own way/as suits the occasion; within its capacity/within limitations
其れ所か: (それどころか) - on the contrary
其れ故: (それゆえ) - therefore; for that reason; so
其れ相応: (それそうおう) - appropriate; suitable; proper; fitting
其れ程: (それほど) - to that degree; extent
其れ自体: (それじたい) - in itself; the thing itself; this itself; for its own sake; per se
其れ許り: (そればかり) - that much; as much; to that extent; only that; that alone; no more than that
其れ迄: (それまで) - until then/till then/up to that time; to that extent; the end of it/all there is to it
其処: (そこ) - there (place relatively near listener); there (place just mentioned)/that place; then (of some incident just spoken of)/that (of point just raised); you
其処いら中: (そこいらじゅう) - everywhere; all over the place
其処で: (そこで) - so; accordingly; now; then; thereupon; therefore
其処ら: (そこら) - everywhere; somewhere; approximately; that area; around there
其処ら中: (そこらじゅう) - everywhere; all over the place
其処彼処: (そこかしこ) - here and there; everywhere
其処此処: (そこここ) - here and there; in places
其処等辺: (そこらへん) - hereabouts; around there; that area
其処許: (そこもと) - that place/there; you (usu. used by samurai when speaking to their equals or inferiors)
其処退け: (そこのけ) - superior to (e.g. professional, etc. in ability or achievement); ignoring (one thing) for (another)
其式: (それしき) - trivial; insignificant; meager; meagre; that little amount; such a small extent
其所彼所: (そこかしこ) - here and there; everywhere
其方: (そち) - that way (direction distant from the speaker, close to the listener); there (place distant from the speaker, close to the listener); that one (something close to the listener); you/your family/your company; that person (someone close to the listener)
其程: (それほど) - to that degree; extent
其色月: (そのいろづき) - eighth month of the lunar calendar
其許: (そこもと) - that place/there; you (usu. used by samurai when speaking to their equals or inferiors)
其許り: (そればかり) - that much; as much; to that extent; only that; that alone; no more than that
其迄: (それまで) - until then/till then/up to that time; to that extent; the end of it/all there is to it
具: (gu) - tool , tool, means; ingredients (adicionado à sopa, arroz, etc.); counter for sets of armor, utensils, furniture, etc.
具える: (そなえる) - to furnish/to provide for/to equip/to install; to have ready/to prepare for; to possess (all that is needed)/to be endowed with/to be armed with; to be born with/to have since birth
具す: (ぐす) - to accompany/to follow; to assemble (necessary items)/to prepare
具する: (ぐする) - to accompany/to follow; to assemble (necessary items)/to prepare
具だくさん: (ぐだくさん) - full of ingredients; hearty; substantial
具に: (つぶさに) - in detail; with great care; completely; again and again
具のないスープ: (ぐのないスープ) - soup with no ingredients
具の無いスープ: (ぐのないスープ) - soup with no ingredients
具わる: (そなわる) - to be furnished with/to be provided with/to be equipped with; to be possessed of/to be endowed with/to be gifted with; to be among/to be one of
具体化: (ぐたいか) - embodiment; materialization; actualization; realization; taking form; taking shape
具体的: (ぐたいてき) - concrete; tangible; definite; specific
具体的対象: (ぐたいてきたいしょう) - concrete object
具合: (guai) - condição, estado; saúde, estado (de saúde), condição, estado; saúde, estado (de saúde); modo, maneira; circunstância, sorte
